page.title: 01INTRODUCING MONKTON FARLEIGH
page.content: Our Survey Area is almost completely open{countryside}and{farmland,}on the edge of the Cotswold Hills.We have the villages of{Monkton Farleigh,Kingsdown and a small part of{South Wraxall . There are many small farms with mostly {arable }and{cattle farming.}There is a mixture of old and new houses. Most of the old houses are built of{limestone, quarried locally.There are very{few {main roads}and only{one shop.}There is quite a lot of{deciduous woodland}in our survey area.The main features are Monkton Farleigh and South Wraxall Manors,the Secret Underground City,and the Golf Course at Kingsdown.Monkton Farleigh also has remains like the {Monks Conduit}and the{Monastery,}from which the village gets its name.I think our survey area is a very{quiet, {pleasant place}and I would never want to live in a town.
